title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 113.4 - Vessels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 113.4 - Vessels

State Regulations
(a) The use of
vessels propelled by electric motors is permitted on the area. (b) The use of vessels propelled by gasoline
motors is prohibited except on Swinging Bridge Reservoir. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
113.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
